name: 5-dimethylhydantoin (MMDMH)
5-dimethylhydantoin on a dry basis (DMH)
FoodContactSubstance: An approximately 1:1 mixture of hydroxymethyl-5,5-dimethylhydantoin (MMDMH)(CAS Reg. No. 27636-82-4) and 1,3-bis(hydroxymethyl)-5,5-dimethylhydantoin (DMDMH), (CAS Reg. No. 6440-58-0), containing up to 8.5 percent by weight residual 5,5-dimethylhydantoin on a dry basis (DMH)(CAS Reg. No. 77-71-4) or up to 5.5 percent in the formulated product.
